Package ooga.model.components.moverestrictions

Class EnPassant

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.components.moverestrictions.Restriction
ooga.model.components.moverestrictions.EnPassant
public class EnPassant
extends Restriction
The en passant movement in chess. Allows a pawn to take another pawn in passing, only right after the other pawn moves and if its first move is two spaces forward
